text:
POPSUGAR - http://www.popsugar.com/ - San Francisco, California

POPSUGAR is an independent media and technology company where more than 75 million women go for original, inspirational content that feeds their passions and interests. We are equal parts best friend and trusted expert, and our team of more than 100 editors is renowned for producing up-to-the-minute content on all the topics and lively conversations women are passionate about. POPSUGAR is now in seven countries and expanding.

Details for all open positions at http://corp.popsugar.com/latest/jobs
